text: Paul Thomas Anderson (born June 26, 1970) is an American filmmaker. He was nominated for eight Academy Awards. ==Movies== *Hard Eight *Boogie Nights *Magnolia *Punch-Drunk Love *There Will Be Blood *The Master *Inherent Vice *Phantom Thread ==References== == Other websites == * * * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Los Angeles Category:Movie producers from Los Angeles Category:Screenwriters from Los Angeles
title: Paul Thomas Anderson
